quote: The only real security that a man can have in this world is a reserve of knowledge, experience and ability.  – Henry Ford
fact: The average lead pencil will draw a line 35 miles long or write approximately 50,000 English words.  More than 2 billion pencils are manufactured each year in the United States. If these were laid end to end they would circle the world nine times.
joke: What do you get if you cross a turkey with a ghost? A poultry-geist!
